title: UPDATE: Accidental shooting at Timber Ridge Apartments; no charges filed
content:
CHATTANOOGA, TN (WRCB) -
Chattanooga police say a person was accidentally shot this afternoon off East Brainerd Road.
It happened shortly after 2:30 p.m. on Timber Knoll Drive at Timber Ridge Apartments.
Police confirm one person was accidentally shot, but did not provide details of the shooting.
Shooting reported at Timber Ridge Apts. Limited details right now. No word on victim's condition. pic.twitter.com/1AKgfFq79n
— Sara Sidery (@SaraSideryWRCB) October 14, 2016
The victim's condition is unknown.
No charges will be filed.
Stay with WRCBtv.com for updates to this developing story.
